alert.note: Alert for Parke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 4:55PM EDT until May 14 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Parke County in west central Indiana... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 455 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rockville, or 19 miles north of Terre Haute, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rockville around 505 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rosedale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
